landingPageInfo.title: Welcome to TaskMaster
landingPageInfo.text: Boost your productivity with TaskMaster. Create, organize, and track your tasks effortlessly.
landingPageInfo.subtitle: Why TaskMaster?
landingPageInfo.subtitleListFirst: <0> - Easy Task Management: </0> Add, edit, and delete tasks with ease.
landingPageInfo.subtitleListSecond: <0> - Reminders: </0> Never miss a deadline with automatic reminders.
landingPageInfo.subtitleListThird: <0> - Prioritize: </0> Focus on what matters most.
landingPageInfo.finalWord: Join thousands of users taking control of their tasks today!

resetPassword.subtitle: Reset Password
resetPassword.firstSentence: Create a new password that you don't use on any other site,
resetPassword.secondSentence: Strong password contains letters, numbers and special characters

verifyEmail.subtitle: Verify your email address
verifyEmail.text: By verifying your email, you will confirm that you want to use this as your TaskMaster account email address. Once it's done you will be able to start with creating and achieving your daily goals.
